captions.text:
♪
[ sighs ]
♪ sometimes I think ♪
♪ when I look up real high ♪

♪ that there's such
a big world up there ♪

♪ I'd like to give it
a try ♪
♪ but then I sink ♪

♪ 'cause it's here
I'm supposed to stay ♪

♪ but I get
so lonely down here ♪

♪ tell me, why does it
have to be that way ♪

♪ up there
there is so much room ♪

♪ where babies burp
and flowers bloom ♪

♪ everyone dreams
I could dream too ♪
<i>♪ up there ♪</i>

<i>♪ up where the skies</i>
<i>are ocean blue ♪</i>

♪ I could be safe
and live without a care ♪
<i>♪ up there ♪</i>

♪ they say I don't belong ♪
[ backup singers ]
♪ oooh-ooh, oooh-ooh ♪

♪ I must stay below
alone ♪
♪ oooh-ooh ♪

♪ because
of my beliefs ♪

♪ I'm supposed to stay
where evil is sown ♪

- ♪ oooh ooh-ooh-oooh ♪
- ♪ but what is evil anyway ♪

- ♪ is there reason
to the rhyme ♪
- ♪ oooh-ooh, oooh-ooh ♪

♪ without evil
there could be no good ♪

♪ so it must be good
to be evil sometimes ♪

♪ up there
there is so much room ♪

♪ where babies burp
and flowers bloom ♪

♪ everyone dreams
I can dream too ♪
♪ up there ♪

♪ up where the skies
are ocean blue ♪

♪ I could be safe
and live without a care ♪
♪ without a care ♪

♪ live without a care ♪
♪ if I could ♪
♪ if only I could live ♪

[ falsetto ]
♪ up there ♪

♪ I wanna live
I wanna live up ♪

♪ oooooh, yeah
oooooh ♪
♪ I want to live ♪
♪ up there ♪
<i>Ohhh !</i>

title: Up There - South Park: Bigger Longer & Uncut (8/9) Movie CLIP (1999) HD

comments.text:
I'm not a religious person at all, but when I see this it make's me think 
"IF heaven and hell do exist who is to say Satan is the bad one?, what if 
God is the evil one and he locked away Satan in hell so he/God could make a 
lot of pain and suffering in the world, and then when we ask why he doesn't 
do anything to help us it's because he is the evil one".﻿

Subtle and genius as always, South Park haha.





Making Satan gay and show him in hell with gay people in a cruise ship 
(worldfamous gay parade in Amsterdam is always in boats), while being in 
the air with a rainbow-pattern flag, followed up immediately with a scene 
where everything supposedly went up in fire. Thus: being gay is bad and 
causes you to burn in hell.﻿
